com.jieli.stream.dv.gdxxx.ui.widget.coverflow

类 CoverFlowLayoutManger

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager
      • com.jieli.stream.dv.gdxxx.ui.widget.coverflow.CoverFlowLayoutManger

  • public class CoverFlowLayoutManger
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.LayoutManager
    Cover Flow布局类

    通过重写LayoutManger布局方法onLayoutChildren(RecyclerView.Recycler, RecyclerView.State) 对Item进行布局，并对超出屏幕的Item进行回收

    通过重写LayoutManger中的scrollHorizontallyBy(int, RecyclerView.Recycler, RecyclerView.State) 进行水平滚动处理

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  CoverFlowLayoutManger.Builder 
      static interface  CoverFlowLayoutManger.OnSelected
      选中监听接口
